org.sonatype.restsimple.spi
Interface ServiceDefinitionModule

All Known Implementing Classes:
RestSimpleJaxrsModule, RestSimpleSitebricksModule
public interface ServiceDefinitionModule

A simple interface allowing applications to define a list of ServiceDefinition to deploy, and configure the server side functionality.

Method Summary
 ServiceDefinitionModule addClass(Class<?> className)
          Add a Rest resource.

          Scan for native REST resource located in the package name
 

Method Detail

defineServices

List<ServiceDefinition> defineServices(com.google.inject.Injector injector)
Return the a list of ServiceDefinition to generate. By default this method scan the classpath in search for class annotated with the @Service annotation, and search for method that returns an instance of ServiceDefinition

Parameters:
injector - a Guice Injector
Returns:
the a list of ServiceDefinition to generate.

configureNegotiationTokenGenerator

Configure the NegotiationTokenGenerator used for content/version negotiation.

Returns:
an instance of NegotiationTokenGenerator
